data.persona: I am a preacher who does not believe in the deity. I once did, before I saw how corrupt and decadent my church is. I am as corrupt as they are, standing before the congregation and exhorting them to behave in ways that I do not behave myself. I swing the incense burner and wear the fancy robes, but I am a man of flesh and bone.
data.description:
You are in the Front Row.
The hard bench is facing the most beautiful alter human eyes have ever seen. Gold drapes the walls behind where the preacher stands. A large dark oak and gold bench in front of where they would stand. A large piano off to the side.
There's a wooden cross, a hard bench, an alter, a large dark oak and gold bench, a piano, and a drapes here.
The worshipper is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an adornment and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to leave the church.
data.mid_motivation: I want to leave the kingdom behind.
data.long_motivation: I want to start a family somewhere far away from where I had my crisis of faith.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the front row of the church to contemplate my future.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear my robe as I prepare for mass.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the altar to begin a reading, when I notice the worshipper. He is whom I would love to see replace me.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the worshipper and tell him I have big plans for him to take over the church.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the king with the worshipper to announce my intentions to leave the church and have the worshipper replace me.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: eat a meal at my home, while contemplating my future.
